exec go build -C $BITFIELD_DIR -o $TMPDIR/bitfield
! exec $TMPDIR/bitfield -in $WORK/mystruct.go
! stdout .
cp stderr got
cmp got want

-- mystruct.go --
package main

type MyStruct struct {
	CoarseX    uint8  `bitfield:"bits=5"`
	CoarseY    uint8  `bitfield:"bits=5"`
	NametableX uint8  `bitfield:"bits=1"`
	NametableY uint8  `bitfield:"bits=1"`
	FineY      uint8  `bitfield:"bits=3"`
	_          uint8  `bitfield:"bits=1"`
	_          uint16 `bitfield:"bits=16"`
	BigField   uint32 `bitfield:"bits=32"`
	Extra      uint8  `bitfield:"bits=1"`
}

-- want --
bitfield, fatal error:
	struct 'MyStruct' has too many bits (65)
